LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipWillNeverEatAdd: Adding plants will stop an animal from eating it Usually used to prevent animals from eating special plants, like Anima or Gauranlen trees This is only relevant to animals which can eat such plants, as an animal is always limited to its Food Type setting
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipWillNeverEatRemove: Removing plants will allow an animal to eat it
